title: TypeCon2008 Calls for Submissions for Speakers
content:
We're gearing up for TypeCon2008 in Buffalo (July 15-20). Right now, SOTA is accepting proposals for presentations, panel discussions, workshops, and sessions at the type and design education forum. All Typophiles are welcome to submit proposals.

Even if you're not up for speaking, let us know what you'd like to see on the program at the conference. Feel free to post your ideas here.

Full details of calls for submissions are at [http://www.typecon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417044532/http:/www.typecon.com/ "http://www.typecon.com").
author: tamye

comments.content: Not a presentation, but I think it would be timely if there was a panel debating how type should be presented on the web.
